definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass

sentences.english: Made of specially-treated material, the coat is light in weight and machine washable.
sentences.chinese: 該大衣由經過特殊處理的面料做成，重量輕，可機洗。

sentences.english: This branch is obsoleted. Engineering resource will no longer be invested on this branch in general.
sentences.chinese: 此分支已淘汰，除特殊狀況人力不再投注於此版上。

sentences.english: LASIK eye surgery poses particular risks for some people.
sentences.chinese: 對有些人來說LASIK眼科手術有特殊的風險。

sentences.english: I had a feeling we were at Portsea for some special reason of hers.
sentences.chinese: 我感到我們到港海是有她特殊的原因。

sentences.english: Special problems will occur during its translation into Chinese, one of which is back-translation.
sentences.chinese: 將其譯爲中文時會出現一些特殊的問題，譬如回譯。

sentences.english: In the implementation of this cross-century strategy, ethnic issues merit special attention.
sentences.chinese: 民族問題在這項跨世紀戰略的實施中具有特殊的地位。

sentences.english: However, Group B patients enjoyed conventional care instead of special care.
sentences.chinese: 乙組按常規護理，不對照顧者進行特殊施教。

sentences.english: We also intend to remove any special naming restriction.
sentences.chinese: 我們還希望刪除任何特殊的命名限制。

sentences.english: He's going to have to go to a special school. He'll be just fine.
sentences.chinese: 他應該上特殊學校，在那裏他會很好的。

sentences.english: Our visit abroad has been cancelled due to some special reasons.
sentences.chinese: 由於特殊原因，我們這次外訪活動被取消了。

sentences.english: There're many ecial rules for mailing packages regarding size and how they're packed.
sentences.chinese: 是的，包裹的大小和包裝法有許多特殊的規定。

sentences.english: Then using a special knife, they cut off the lids of the cells.
sentences.chinese: 用一種特殊的刀，刮下蜂板上的覆蓋層。

sentences.english: The icon for the file should now be the special "UDL" icon.
sentences.chinese: 該文件的圖標，現在應該是特殊的“太元”圖標。

sentences.english: Do you feel like you were born to accomplish a special mission in life?
sentences.chinese: 你是否覺得生來是爲了要完成一件生命中的特殊使命？

sentences.english: Cobweb models on times scales are established and discussed.
sentences.chinese: 提出時標下的蛛網模型，討論模型的幾種特殊珠情況。

sentences.english: As a special environment , education can promote the intell…
sentences.chinese: 教育作爲特殊環境，對智力發展有促進作用。

definition: to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
